title: wine_Raats_Family_2013_Red_Jasper_Red_(Stellenbosch)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 99167.
country: South Africa.
description: Known for working well with the grape, this Raats wine is Cabernet Franc dominant (85%), with additional components of Malbec, Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot and Merlot. Forward scents of green pepper, tobacco leaf, cigar ash and menthol are framed by a fruity spice of blackberry and cassis. The medium-weight mouthfeel is approachable yet structured, with fine-grain tannins and a licorice-infused, brambly berry finish. Drink nowâ€“2019..
designation: Red Jasper.
points: 90.
price: 20.0.
province: Stellenbosch.
